DataElement.preferredName: Transfusion Last Year Information Collected Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date response regarding when information collected for the past year pertaining to any transfusions was entered into the database.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: (trans-FYOO-zhun) The infusion of components of blood or whole blood into the bloodstream. The blood may be donated from another person, or it may have been taken from the person earlier and stored until needed._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._Collected; brought together in one place.
